full_output.summary: Highly skilled and adaptable professional with expertise in designing, analyzing, and supporting applications.Proficient in transforming complex data into actionable insights to drive athlete and team performance. Possesses excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills. Dedicated to delivering high-quality results and willing to relocate and work in 24x7 shifts to meet project needs across India.

experiences.description: Implemented machine learning algorithm, build a simple linear regression model to predict air quality Index of Mumbai city for the year 2022. Collaborated with a team of data engineers to design and train learning model for data processing, testing and achieving a 15% reduction in false positive rates. Collected the dataset from cpcb website using the api key. Demonstrated expertise in data visualization using matplotlib, seaborn, pandas, numpy and cartopy library for plotting Mumbai city with aqi Index on a global map.
